page.title: 05Lessons in Elton School
page.content: Fractions are the hardest part of Maths.Our teacher for Maths is very understanding if we get stuck. Religious Education is another lesson we do in school.Each piece of work we do is on a blank piece of paper.We have to make a border and decorate it. TV provides some lessons such as Near and Far which is about Geography.We do painting,knitting,sewing,printing and clay work in art.In English we learn about nouns,adverbs,pronouns,verbs, similes and adjectives.The girls play netball and rounders according to the season and the boys football and cricket.All the juniors go to Oundle School swimming pool on a fortnightly basis.Transport is provided by mothers with cars.We all enjoy Singing Together on the radio.
